participant_1.background:
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
I lost my best friend, my dog, when I was away on business.
i ride a skateboard.
my name is dave.
i enjoy comedies.

participant_2.background:
I bought a ball for my dog, Toto.
I'm not very tall, but I make up for it with my sweet treats.
i love the game halo.
I want to share a Coke with my family.
christmas is my favorite holiday.

content.text: I love to play Halo, and I like to spend time with my family.
I love to play Halo too! What is your favorite part of the game?
I love the campaign mode, and I also like to play multiplayer with my friends.
I love the campaign mode too! It is so much fun to work together with your friends to beat the game.
I agree! It is also really fun to compete with your friends in multiplayer.
I know what you mean! I am not very tall, but I make up for it with my sweet treats.
That is a great way to make up for being short! I am not very tall either, but I do not mind.
I do not mind it either! I think it is fun to be different.
I agree! It is fun to be unique.
I am glad we agree! What is your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Christmas! I love spending time with my family and eating lots of food.
I love Christmas too! It is so much fun to celebrate with your family and friends.
I agree! It is the best time of year!
